alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 22 at 8:06PM MDT until April 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Dona Ana and Otero Counties in New Mexico, El Paso County in Far West Texas. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, through midnight MDT tonight. The Blowing Dust Advisory has expired. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing dust will continue for a couple more hours, but only with minor visibility reductions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin
